Package smarthome.controller

Class ActuatorRESTController

java.lang.Object
smarthome.controller.ActuatorRESTController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/actuators") public class ActuatorRESTController extends Object
REST controller for managing actuators.

    • closeBlindRoller

      Closes the blind roller with the given id and value.

      actuatorId - the id of the actuator to close
      percentage - the value to close the actuator with
